name: Evee
describe: The DNA of this very special Pokémon contains many possibilities for evolution.

name: Vaporeon
describe: Its cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. Once in this element, it becomes undetectable to the naked eye.

name: Jolteon
describe: It takes charge of negative ions contained in the air to send discharges of approximately 10,000 volts.

name: Flareon
describe: It stores air in its flame pocket and heats it to a temperature of 1,700°C.

name: Nucleon
describe: One of the only non-feral Nuclear Pokémon. It's theorized that its bond with its trainer when it was an Eevee allows it to stay in control.

name: Xenomite
describe: A species that spontaneously appeared in irradiated zones. It is thought to have hatched from a corrupted egg.

name: Xenogen
describe: A bizarre life form which thrives in irradiated fields of nuclear waste. It is a parasitic creature that latches on to any prey and suck out its life force.

name: Xenoqueen
describe: It is known to spit radioactive acid capable of melting through steel. It is a ruthless predator that will attack any living creature, human or Pokémon.

name: Hazma
describe: They appear in the aftermath of nuclear fallout. They feed on radiation and can clean an irradiated area over time.

name: Urayne
describe: A legendary Pokémon born in a nuclear disaster. It has to consume radioactive materials in order to function. Without them, it will enter a dormant state.
